short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use Ryan's Authenticator in your browser!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to view one time passwords (2fa) in your browser. You can register for an account at https://otp.ryansainty.com/Account/Register. Once complete; you can begin adding your one time passwords which can then be viewed via the website, chrome extension, desktop app or CLI.

All information entered is stored using secure methods & I will never collect, sell or transfer ANY data.
